quoteText: (2) to provide advertising and other information to you,
title: The service uses your personal data for advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data for advertising
tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "In consideration for the rights granted to you under the Agreements, you grant us the right (1) to allow the Spotify Service to use the processor, bandwidth, and storage hardware on your Device in order to facilitate the operation of the Service, (2) to provide advertising and other information to you,"
